caption.center: JARED L. NOONAN, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District.

opinion.posture: 3.850 Appeal from the Circuit Court for Hernando County, Stephen Rushing, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Jared Noonan, Milton, pro se.
No Appearance for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
PALMER, TORPY and JACOBUS, JJ., concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL THE TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION, AND, IF FILED DISPOSED OF.
